# PED::SET_PED_CAN_BE_KNOCKED_OFF_BIKE

## Deprecated
Use knock off vehicle commands above

## Summary
Sets that a ped can be knocked off

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BIKE_KNOCKOFF** canBeKnockedOffFlag

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This native does absolutely nothing, just a nullsub
